page.title: 18B.M.X.RACING
page.content: MY FAVOURITE HOBBY IS{B.M.X.RACING. B.M.X. RACING STARTED IN AMERICA ABOUT FOUR YEARS AGO. B.M.X. BIKES ARE DIFFERENT FROM ORDINARY BIKES BECAUSE THEY ARE MUCH STRONGER. THEY ALSO HAVE PROTECTIVE PADS ON THE STEM, CROSSBAR AND HANDLEBARS. THEY ARE LIGHTER THAN NORMAL BIKES BECAUSE THEY ARE MADE OF AN AIRCRAFT ALLOY THEN DIPPED INTO A CHROME COATING. THEY HAVE A POINTED PLASTIC SEAT WHICH IS LIGHTER. STRONG WHEELS HELP A LOT.{B.M.X. MEANS {'BICYCLE MOTOCROSS'.}THE TRACK CONSISTS OF A STARTING GATE WITH SEPARATE STARTING LANES FOR EACH RIDER.A"WHOOP" COMES NEXT (A SMALL HUMP)THEN A CORNER CALLED A "BERM" THEN A "CAMEL" (WHICH IS TWO BIG HUMPS TOGETHER). AFTER THAT COMES "A BERM" THEN A"TABLETOP"(ONE BIG HUMP WITH A FLAT TOP).LASTLY THE "DOUBLE WHOOPS"THEN THE FINISHING LINE.
